Welcome to PySLAM's documentation!
==================================

**PySLAM** is a collection of autonomous navigation methods used for Simultaneous 
Localization And Mapping built in Python. The intent of the project is to create
application-agnostic object-oriented implementations of these methods to enable
them to be re-used over time.

.. note::
    This project is under active development.

.. autosummary::
    :toctree: generated
    :template: custom-module-template.rst
    :recursive:
    
    localization
    mapping
    slam
